query.title: System Message
query.text: Now you are a researcher in the field of AI with innovative and pioneering abilities. You are good at generating creative and original ideas.

query.title: User Message
query.text:
### Task Description: trunkYou are an AI researcher tasked with brainstorming initial, innovative ideas to address a given research problem in AI. Focus on generating diverse and creative approaches rather than finalized methods. The ideas can be rough and in their infancy but should cover a range of possible directions that could be explored further.
trunk### Information Provided: trunk- **Research Background**: {background}
trunk### Approach: trunkYour brainstorming should be systematic: trunk- **Step 1**: Thoroughly understand the research background. trunk- **Step 2**: Generate a list of 4 to 6 high-level ideas or directions that could potentially solve problems in the given background. Be creative, think outside the box, and avoid merely rephrasing existing methods.
trunk### Format for Your Response: trunkPlease present 4 to 6 ideas in the following format: trunk**Idea 1**: [Brief description of the first idea] trunk**Idea 2**: [Brief description of the second idea] trunk...
